mapper.select:
select a.* from BI_TRANSFORM_SERVERS a
and a.SERVERID=#SERVERID# and a.TRANSFORMTYPE=#TRANSFORMTYPE# and a.GUID=#GUID#
order by a.createtime desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BI_TRANSFORM_SERVERS ( guid, SERVERID, TRANSFORMTYPE, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid
) select #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SERVERID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TRANSFORMTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
mapper.update:
UPDATE BI_TRANSFORM_SERVERS
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, SERVERID=#SERVERID#, TRANSFORMTYPE=#TRANSFORMTYPE#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
